Posted By: Zenzei (1/27/2011 8:33:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: What I really like about this card is how much the art looks like the original and yet is different enough to really work. It has the same basic body shape, just an updated style that really captures it. As for mechanically, it depends on what you're doing--a 2/2 for 3 that lets you draw a card isn't bad, and in the right deck it can work really well. Still, the art is really good, it just makes the card. It's intimidating, a little creepy, and in a twisted phyrexian way awesome looking.
posts.html:
What I really like about this card is how much the art looks like the original and yet is different enough to really work. It has the same basic body shape, just an updated style that really captures it. As for mechanically, it depends on what you're doing--a 2/2 for 3 that lets you draw a card isn't bad, and in the right deck it can work really well. Still, the art is really good, it just makes the card. It's intimidating, a little creepy, and in a twisted phyrexian way awesome looking.
